Detailed Description

A Preference that allows for string input.

It is a subclass of DialogPreference and shows the EditWidget in a dialog. This EditWidget can be modified through XML by setting any EditWidget attributes on the EditTextPreference.

This preference will store a string into the ApplicationPreferences.

See EditWidget Attributes.
